name: Upstream Planned CU Count
description: Number of planned clean up records. For casting, the clean ups from 'Upstream Logs - Simplified' table is counted where consecutively similar clean ups are combined into one clean up. For coating, it is the raw count of clean ups in 'Upstream Logs - Raw'.
expression: VAR CAST = CALCULATE( [CAST Clean Up Count], 'Upstream Log Simplified'[Causes] = "Planned" )
VAR COAT = CALCULATE( [COAT Clean Up Count], 'Upstream Log'[Causes] = "Planned" )
